DataElement.preferredName: Lymphedema Symptom Intensity and Distress Survey-Arm V 2.0 During Past Week Have Cramping Pain in Your Arm Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether or not they had cramping pain in their arm during the past week, using a yes or no response.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lymphedema Symptom Intensity and Distress Survey-Arm During Past Week Have Cramping Pain in Your Arm
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-report tool designed to evaluate arm lymphedema and associated symptoms in breast cancer survivors._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about whether an individual experiences or experienced cramping pain in their arm.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
